author: ― Louisa May Alcott
string: “ I'm not afraid of storms, for I'm learning how to sail my ship. ”

author: ― Joseph Campbell
string: “ We must let go of the life we have planned, so as to accept the one that is waiting for us. ”

author: ― Oscar Wilde
string: “ Be yourself everyone else is already taken. ”

author: ― Frank Zappa
string: “ So many books, so little time. ”

author: ― Mae West
string: “ You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough. ”

author: ― Mahatma Gandhi
string: “ Be the change that you wish to see in the world. ”

author: ― Mark Twain
string: “ If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything. ”

author: ― André Gide
string: “ It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not.  ”
